Uses of Package
game

  • Packages that use game 
    Package Description
    game  
    screens  
  • Classes in game used by game 
    Class and Description
    Assets
    Class to organize and structure our assets
    Assets.AssetCardHitPoints
    Class used to load assets related with the hit points of a card
    Assets.AssetFonts
    Class used to load assets related with the fonts used to write messages on screen
    Assets.AssetMusic
    Class used to load the music assets
    Assets.AssetsCards
    Class used to load assets related with the game screen, specially cards
    Assets.AssetSounds
    Class used to load assets related with the sounds the game implements
    WorldController
    Class that handles and processes the input of the GameScreen and updates the game accordingly to the game logic
  • Classes in game used by screens 
    Class and Description
    WorldController
    Class that handles and processes the input of the GameScreen and updates the game accordingly to the game logic
    WorldRenderer
    Class that renders the images of the GameScreen
